thread.title: Radar tracking reveals how bees refine their flightpath

title: Radar tracking reveals how bees refine their flightpath
text:
Radar tracking reveals how bees refine their flightpath 3:57pm GMT - 01:22 
The humble bumblebee may have a brain the size of a pinhead, but it's no fool when it comes to route planning. British researchers have shown that bumblebees hone their routes from flower to flower to save both time and energy. Anna Bevan reports   
The humble bumblebee may have a brain the size of a pinhead, but it's no fool when it comes to route planning. British researchers have shown that bumblebees hone their routes from flower to flower to save both time and energy. Anna Bevan reports  //reut.rs/2BLvvtd
